XII.ii.3.C.1.a
.
Responsibility for Establishing eFolders
The St. Louis Regional Office’s (RO’s) Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS) Unit
establishes electronic claims folders (eFolders) in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS), when necessary, for the processing of REPS claims, and
stores all REPS-related documentation in the eFolders.
All
VA Forms 21P-8924, Application of Surviving Spouse or Child for REPS Benefits (Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors)
, and related REPS material addressed to the St. Louis RO are forwarded directly to the REPS Unit.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - St. Louis Regional Office (RO) Actions on Claims for Benefits Under the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
